set1.question: What has one eye but cannot see?

set1.question: If I have it, I don't share it. If I share it, I don't have it. What is it?
set1.hint: I'm situated at the top peak, where people translate an idea into a good service/product

set1.question: The more I am present, the less you can see. Who am I?
set1.hint: Get me from the team, who freely distributes to the community of coders

set1.question: I don't have legs but I have hands. I can run but I can't walk. Who am I?
set1.hint: Find me in the stall, who has a property of water and fit in any shape and space in an effective manner

set1.question: I start with T and end with T and have T in me. Who am I?
set1.hint: Stall where trust worthy pirates reside

set1.question: I have keys but no locks. I have space but no room. You can enter but can't go outside. What am I?
set1.hint: Search me with people, who can accomodate and handle growing amount of work

set1.question: I am a fruit. I am tasty and provide lots of energy. You can find also me in a calendar. Who am I?
set1.hint: Search me with the people, who ensure that you are building the product right

set1.question: There are three houses. One is red, one is blue, and one is white. If the red house is to the left of the house in the middle, and the blue house is to the right to the house in the middle, where is the white house?
